title: 41Having "not enough workers" is the only way to make wages go upposted2 hours agobyAVeryNakedMan5 c
content:
42 Having "not enough workers" is the only way to make wages go up posted 2 hours ago by AVeryNakedMan 5 comments award share report block I feel like Trump is meeting with so many CEO's that all want cheap labor, that he is out of touch with the average worker. He is only hearing the CEO perspective on wages. To a CEO, if wages are rising, it is a problem. But to 99.9% of America, it is a good thing. We need a Republican party that welcomes "labor shortages" to increase wages for workers. Not fights against them to help CEO's buy another yacht. Keep in mind that in the USA we have the world's 3rd largest population. There are plenty of workers to perform labor for ANY company and ANY role. But CEO's always want to import cheaper workers from abroad, to increase their profits. We should not sacrifice the wellbeing of 99.9% of America so that CEO's can go from being millionaires to being billionaires.
